verses.verse: The word <WH1697> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from Yahweh, <WH3068> saying, <WH559>
Thus speaks <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> Write <WH3789> all the words <WH1697> that I have spoken <WH1696> to you in a book. <WH5612>

For, <WH3117> behold, the days come, <WH935> says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> that I will turn again <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478> and Judah, <WH3063> says <WH559> Yahweh; <WH3068> and I will cause them to return <WH7725> to the land <WH776> that I gave <WH5414> to their fathers, <WH1> and they shall possess it. <WH3423>
These are the words <WH1697> that Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> concerning Israel <WH3478> and concerning Judah. <WH3063>
For thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> We have heard <WH8085> a voice <WH6963> of trembling, <WH2731> of fear, <WH6343> and not of peace. <WH7965>

Ask <WH7592> now, <WH7200> and see whether a man <WH2145> does travail with child: <WH3205> why do I see <WH7200> every man <WH1397> with his hands <WH3027> on his waist, <WH2504> as a woman in travail, <WH3205> and all faces <WH6440> are turned <WH2015> into paleness? <WH3420>
Alas! <WH1945> for that day <WH3117> is great, <WH1419> so that <WH369> none is like it: <WH6256> it is even the time of Jacob <WH3290>'s trouble; <WH6869> but he shall be saved out of it. <WH3467>

It shall come to pass in that day, <WH3117> says <WH5002> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> that I will break <WH7665> his yoke <WH5923> from off your neck, <WH6677> and will burst <WH5423> your bonds; <WH4147> and strangers <WH2114> shall no more make him their bondservant; <WH5647>
but they shall serve <WH5647> Yahweh <WH3068> their God, <WH430> and David <WH1732> their king, <WH4428> whom I will raise up to them. <WH6965>

Therefore don't <WH3372> you be afraid, O Jacob <WH3290> my servant, <WH5650> says <WH5002> Yahweh; <WH3068> neither be dismayed, <WH2865> Israel: <WH3478> for, <WH3467> behold, I will save you from afar, <WH7350> and your seed <WH2233> from the land <WH776> of their captivity; <WH7628> and Jacob <WH3290> shall return, <WH7725> and shall be quiet <WH8252> and at ease, <WH7599> and none shall make him afraid. <WH2729>

For I am with you, <WH5002> says Yahweh, <WH3068> to save <WH3467> you: <WH6213> for I will make a full end <WH3617> of all the nations <WH1471> where I have scattered <WH6327> you, <WH6213> but I will not make a full end <WH3617> of you; <WH3256> but I will correct you in measure, <WH4941> and will in no way leave <WH5352> you unpunished. <WH5352>
For thus says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> Your hurt <WH7667> is incurable, <WH605> and your wound <WH4347> grievous. <WH2470>
There is none to plead <WH1777> your cause, <WH1779> that you may be bound up: <WH4205> you have no healing <WH8585> medicines. <WH7499>

All your lovers <WH157> have forgotten <WH7911> you; <WH1875> they don't seek you: <WH5221> for I have wounded you with the wound <WH4347> of an enemy, <WH341> with the chastisement <WH4148> of a cruel one, <WH394> for the greatness <WH7230> of your iniquity, <WH5771> because your sins <WH2403> were increased. <WH6105>

Why do you cry <WH2199> for your hurt? <WH7667> Your pain <WH4341> is incurable: <WH605> for the greatness <WH7230> of your iniquity, <WH5771> because your sins <WH2403> were increased, <WH6105> I have done these things to you. <WH6213>

Therefore all those who devour <WH398> you shall be devoured; <WH398> and all your adversaries, <WH6862> everyone of them, <WH3212> shall go into captivity; <WH7628> and those who despoil <WH4933> you shall be a spoil, <WH7601> and all who prey <WH962> on you will I give <WH5414> for a prey. <WH957>

For I will restore <WH5927> health <WH724> to you, <WH7495> and I will heal you of your wounds, <WH4347> says <WH5002> Yahweh; <WH3068> because they have called <WH7121> you an outcast, <WH5080> saying, <WH6726> It is Zion, whom no man seeks after. <WH1875>

Thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> Behold, <WH7725> I will turn again the captivity <WH7622> of Jacob <WH3290>'s tents, <WH168> and have compassion <WH7355> on his dwelling <WH4908> places; <WH5892> and the city shall be built <WH1129> on its own hill, <WH8510> and the palace <WH759> shall be inhabited <WH3427> in its own way. <WH4941>

Out of them shall proceed <WH3318> thanksgiving <WH8426> and the voice <WH6963> of those who make merry: <WH7832> and I will multiply <WH7235> them, <WH4591> and they shall not be few; I will also glorify <WH3513> them, <WH6819> and they shall not be small.
Their children <WH1121> also shall be as before, <WH6924> and their congregation <WH5712> shall be established <WH3559> before <WH6440> me; <WH6485> and I will punish all who oppress them. <WH3905>

Their prince <WH117> shall be of themselves, <WH4910> and their ruler shall proceed <WH3318> from their midst; <WH7130> and I will cause him to draw near, <WH7126> and he shall approach <WH5066> to me: <WH6148> for who is he who has had boldness <WH3820> to approach <WH5066> to me? <WH5002> says Yahweh. <WH3068>
You shall be my people, <WH5971> and I will be your God. <WH430>
Behold, <WH5591> the storm of Yahweh, <WH3068> his wrath, <WH2534> has gone forth, <WH3318> a sweeping <WH1641> storm: <WH5591> it shall burst <WH2342> on the head <WH7218> of the wicked. <WH7563>

The fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639> of Yahweh <WH3068> will not return, <WH7725> until he has executed, <WH6213> and until he has performed <WH6965> the intentions <WH4209> of his heart. <WH3820> In the latter <WH319> days <WH3117> you will understand it. <WH995>
